entry.summary:

Temperature: 2.0°C

Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets this evening then to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
